title: "No Straight Art" (w/ Leland)
itunes:title: "No Straight Art" (w/ Leland)
description:
Brett McLaughlin, known professionally as Leland, joins Matt and Bowen to spill the tea on writing music for Troye Sivan, Daya, Selena Gomez, Boy Erased, and The Other Two. They discuss Troy' and Leland's hit song Bloom bringing talk about anal sex into mainstream pop culture, Leland's experience catering the Golden Globes and years later being nominated for one, and the strong community of LGBTQ song writers he's a part of.

---
